Behavioral.question: Tell me about a time when you worked on a project with a tight deadline.
Tell me about a time when you faced significant unexpected obstacles while working toward a key goal. How did you overcome them, and what would you do differently now?
Tell me about a time when data helped you make a decision.
Tell me about a time when you felt inspired about an idea or project even when your team wasn't as enthusiastic.
Tell me about a time when you led a project from start to finish.
What is a suggestion that a stakeholder provided that did not add much value? How did you handle this & what did you recommend to move the project forward?
Tell me about a time when you were working on a project but discovered an opportunity to do something bigger and better. Did you pursue it and what was the outcome?
What experience do you have managing global teams?
Why do you want to work at LinkedIn?
